name: Balatrodle
description: Guess the Joker from the game Balatro.

name: ClickWord
description: Place letter tiles on the board to make words and score points! Keep placing tiles until you run out.

name: cryptle
description: Slide each row of letters in to the right position to guess the secret word. You have 5 guesses.

name: Decipher
description: Solve the daily cryptogram to reveal the quote.

name: Eruptle
description: Guess the 10 items that fit the prompt, kind of like Family Feud.

name: Factle
description: Find and properly rank the top 5 answers for the given criteria. You have 5 guesses to get it correct.

name: Factle Sports
description: Find and properly rank the top 5 answers for the given sports-related criteria. You have 5 guesses to get it correct.

name: Mahjong Handle
description: Guess the Riichi Mahjong hand in 6 tries.

name: Mazele
description: Guess the correct maze path in the grid in 6 tries or less.

name: Minute Cryptic
description: Solve today's cryptic clue.

name: On the Record
description: Answer the question based on the given quote, Monday through Thursday. Every Friday, you get 10 questions that will last through the weekend.

name: Orbits
description: Place the 8 words in the correct order in the orbit by creating compound words or 2-word phrases.

name: Outword
description: Create 2 words from the given letters. Each letter has a base value and some letters have multipliers, like in Scrabble.

name: PlusWord
description: Solve the mini crossword, then use letters in the shaded squares to figure out an additional word.

name: Pocket Puzzles
description: A collection of daily word games.

name: Rotaboxes
description: Rotate all the tiles into their correct orientation to reveal today's picture.

name: sedecordle
description: Solve 16 wordles at the same time. You have 21 guesses.

name: Soulsborndle
description: Guess bosses from the Soulsborne games by their health, souls, weaknesses and resistances. For fans of Elden Ring, Dark Souls, Demon Souls, and Bloodborne.

name: Squareword
description: Guess 5-letter words to uncover the square of words both horizontally and vertically.

name: Verticle
description: A vertical variant of Wordle.

name: Waffle
description: Swap letters to create words both horizontally and vertically. Seems to have been made before Word Waffle.

name: WordLinx
description: Using a single word as a clue, guess the 4 related words by dragging and dropping letters into the empty spaces.

name: xdle
description: Guess the number between 1 and 999, receiving math clues related to each guess. You have 6 guesses.
